1542560.name: SyncGo Desktop Calendar
1542560.description: SyncGo Desktop Calendar (former Desktop iCalendar) is a Powerful and Flexible Calendar App for Windows. It can sync Google Calendar, Office365 Calendar, iCloud Calendar on your Windows desktop, help you to check the events and to-do list at a glance, so that you will never miss important things in your life.
1542560.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
